topic.title: Enable/Disable Yeastar Click to Call
topic.shortdesc: By default, Yeastar Click to Call is enabled when you download the Extension from Chrome Web Store. You can disable the Extension permanently or temporarily if you don't need it.

section.title: Enable/Disable permanently
section.p: If you don't need Yeastar Click to Call any more, you can permanently disable the Extension. Also, you can follow the operations below to enable Yeastar Click to Call if you've disabled it permanently earlier.

ol.li: In the address bar, enter chrome://extensions/ .

On the Extension page, decide whether to permanently enable or disable Yeastar Click to Call.
To permanently enable Yeastar Click to Call, click .
The icon should be if the Extension is enabled successfully.
To permanently disable Yeastar Click to Call, click .
The icon should be if the Extension is disabled successfully, and the Yeastar icon will not display right beside the address bar (URL field) any more.

section.title: Disable temporarily
section.p: If you don't need Yeastar Click to Call temporarily, but you hope that you can enable the Extension easily and quickly when you need it, you can temporarily disable the Extension.
Also, you can follow the operations below to enable Yeastar Click to Call if you've disabled it temporarily earlier.

ol.li:
On the right of the address bar (URL field), go to
Options .
The configuration window for Yeastar Click to Call pops up.

Under Basic tab, decide whether to enable or temporarily disable Yeastar Click to Call.
To enable Yeastar Click to Call, click .
The icon should be if the Extension is enabled successfully.
To temporarily disable Yeastar Click to Call, click .
The icon should be if the Extension is disabled successfully. The Yeastar icon still displays right beside the address bar (URL field), but Yeastar Click to Call can not work.
